Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: It's been, what...three? Four days? Since Timmy's gone missing...

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: We just moved not a week ago. Haven't even finished unpacking.

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: His room. Where could he have gone? He must be so afraid.

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: I don't know what to do.

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: The police haven't been any help. They completely ignore me!

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: They act like I'm not even there.

Line.speaker: Dad
Line.text: Maybe I should go out again and ask around the neighborhood.

Line.speaker: Tip
Line.text: Take your phone out for a walk and you might find some clues.
